title: Rav Yosef Rebukes Hesder Rosh Yeshiva
body: Rav Yitzchak Yosef publicly rebuked Rav Tamir Granot, rosh yeshiva of Orot Shaul, over comments supporting universal army enlistment. Rav Yosef expressed outrage and questioned Rav Granot's credentials, stating he "cannot be counted in a minyan."

title: Rabbi Dov Hikind Backs Cuomo
body: Rabbi Dov Hikind, a longtime Curtis Sliwa supporter, now backs Andrew Cuomo in the NYC mayoral race, citing Cuomo's chances against Democratic front-runner Zohran Mamdani.

title: Rabbi Brikman Passes Away
body: Rabbi Mayer Chaim Brikman, 58, passed away. He served as Rov of Congregation Kneses Israel – Chabad of Sea Gate for over three decades.
